questions.text: What forbade migration west of the Appalachian mountains or into Canada?
What was sold to the United States for $15 million?
What was the name of the uprising between the Native Americans and the settler of Mexico?

answers.text: The War of a Thousand Deserts

questions.text: The War of a Thousand Deserts was

answers.text: a war between the Apaches and Comanches.
a series of wars between Mexican settlers and the Native Americans.
reinvigorated raids on the Mexican settlers by the Comanche and Apache.
a painting by Brian DeLay depicting Native Americans on the Santa Fe Trail.
was an uprising between the Native Americans and the settlers of Mexico.
was a conflict between the rico officials and the poor nuevomexicanos.
was to take Albino Perez out of office.
provided Manuel Armijo a reason to surrender Santa Fe to the US Army.
